body.name: Wool Dryer Balls Organic XL 6-Pack by Ecoigy, Reusable Natural Fabric Softener for Laundry, Dryer Sheets Alternative, New Zealand Wool, Speed Up Dry Time, Cut Energy Costs
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 7 hrs 17 mins
features: 🐑 STOP BUYING DRYER SHEETS - Set of 6 Original Ecoigy Premium 100% New Zealand Wool Dryer Balls (70mm size). Soften Your Clothes without the Harmful and Toxic Chemicals found in Fabric Softeners and Dryer Sheets.

🌎 ALL NATURAL AND ORGANIC: Eco-Friendly., fragrance free and hypoallergenic. Perfect for babies and sensitive skin. Eliminates waste. 100% Biodegradable & Reusable for 1000+ loads. Extends the life of your clothing. One of the best zero waste products.

SAVE TIME & ENERGY: Speeds up drying time by 20%-40%, saving electricity and dryer wear & tear. Leaves laundry NATURALLY SOFT without dryer sheets or fabric softener. Anti-static properties reduce wrinkles, static cling and lint for all types of clothing.

🎁 GIFT BAG INCLUDED. Beautifully packaged in a well-design reusable cotton bag. Unique and fun gift for baby showers, bridal showers, housewarming, mother’s day, your best friend, or college kids about to start their own laundry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Absolute staple for efficient drying, softening and static remove of clothes. I was a bit worried as these did have a scent when I got them. I’m happy to report that asking using them in my drier there is no longer a scent and it also didn’t transfer to my clothes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars How Does Something This Simple Work So Well?
reviews.reviewText: I purchased these compressed wool dryer balls mostly out of curiosity. As a devout user of fabric softener dryer sheets, I could not understand how these could possibly work. At my first use, I became a true believer. The dryer contained a full washer load of mixed general laundry: underwear, a few shirts, a heavy quilted pillow cover, and towels from the kitchen and two bathrooms. From some recommendation or other, I also reduced the normal medium dryer temperature to low. When I unloaded the dryer, I was delighted to see that the clothes were just warm, entirely dry, and all but one cotton blend shirt was wrinkle free or close to it. The one shirt would require a quick iron touchup. The great results have continued for several months, and I still have no idea how they happen, but they do. The balls themselves are good as new and should easily last for a year or longer. If you are looking to save a little money and do the environment a small favor, I recommend giving this simple solution a try.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Quality Wool!
reviews.reviewText: These work great. I have officially gone completely natural/toxin free with my laundry as I also make my own laundry soap. I generally wash bigger loads, so I usually put 5 or 6 balls in per load. Haven’t noticed if it cuts down on overall drying time, but my clothes definitely feel softer. My favorite thing to do is put a good amount of essential oil drops right on the balls and throw them in the load as usual - the clothes come out smelling amazing! Sandalwood is the best! Smells way better than chemically dryer sheets for sure. I’ve had the balls for a couple months now and they have held up well, maintaining their shape.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great dryer balls
reviews.reviewText: These wool dryers are a wonderful asset for drying clothes without heavy scents.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Replaces fabric softener
reviews.reviewText: I've been using these dryer balls for 6 months now, and they have replaced my liquid fabric softener. For most clothing, the dryer balls handle most of the wrinkles and static. Of course, as with any fabric softener, the things that need ironing are still going to need ironing, but these dryer balls perform at least as well as the liquid fabric softener I was previously using, but without leaving residue on the fabric. They have also measurably sped up the drying time, presumably because the balls bounce around among the items in the dryer, allowing more air circulation. The dryer seems to run a lot more efficiently with these, even just on the air-dry setting. Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Addition to Laundry Room
reviews.reviewText: Great price for these must-have wool dryer balls. These were part of a Christmas gift for my sister who moved into a new place and wanted to start fresh in her laundry room. We love them at home for a more natural way to soften fabric and quicken the drying process. They came in a recyclable cardboard box, and a small cotton draw-string bag for easy contained storage. Definitely recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for the environment!
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this product! The wool balls and the bag they come in are so cute and great for the environment! They work perfectly. I recommend this for everyone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Work just fine
reviews.reviewText: Fluffy, fresh, white, and help laundry dry faster and not wrinkle. They are to replace my original ones which after 10 years were gray with lint they'd picked up. These are like pretty little sheep that live in an immaculate pasture. Make the laundry a bit more cheery.

reviews.reviewTitle: Eco-Friendly Laundry Upgrade with Ecoigy Wool Dryer Balls
reviews.reviewText: I recently switched to the Wool Dryer Balls Organic XL 6-Pack by Ecoigy, and the results have been nothing short of impressive. These reusable, organic wool dryer balls have transformed my laundry routine, offering a sustainable and effective alternative to traditional dryer sheets.Speedy Drying and Reduced Energy Costs (5/5):One of the standout features of these wool dryer balls is their ability to speed up the drying time of my laundry. I noticed a significant reduction in the time it takes for my clothes to dry, translating to lower energy costs and a more eco-friendly laundry process. The efficiency of these balls has been a game-changer for my household.Organic New Zealand Wool (5/5):I appreciate Ecoigy's commitment to using high-quality materials. The organic New Zealand wool not only feels luxurious but also ensures that I'm using a natural and sustainable product in my daily laundry routine. The wool is gentle on fabrics and free from any synthetic additives, making it an excellent choice for those with sensitive skin.Reusable and Cost-Effective (5/5):The fact that these dryer balls are reusable is a significant advantage. Unlike traditional dryer sheets that need constant repurchasing, the Ecoigy Wool Dryer Balls are a one-time investment that pays off in the long run. They withstand numerous drying cycles without losing their effectiveness, making them a cost-effective and environmentally friendly choice.Fabric Softening without Chemicals (5/5):These wool dryer balls are a fantastic alternative to chemical-laden fabric softeners. They naturally soften fabrics during the drying process, leaving my clothes feeling soft and static-free without any residue. It's a healthier option for my family and the environment, and I've noticed a considerable improvement in the overall feel of my laundry.Reduced Wrinkles and Static (5/5):The Ecoigy Wool Dryer Balls excel in minimizing wrinkles and static in my clothes. I no longer find clothes tangled together or clinging to each other after a drying cycle. The balls create a separation between items, allowing air to circulate more freely and resulting in a smoother, static-free finish.Simple to Use (5/5):Using these wool dryer balls is as simple as tossing them into the dryer with your laundry. I appreciate the hassle-free approach, and the fact that they require no additional maintenance or care adds to their convenience.Conclusion:The Wool Dryer Balls Organic XL 6-Pack by Ecoigy has become an essential part of my laundry routine. From faster drying times and reduced energy costs to the organic New Zealand wool and eco-friendly design, these dryer balls have exceeded my expectations. If you're looking for a sustainable, cost-effective, and efficient alternative to traditional dryer sheets, I highly recommend giving Ecoigy's Wool Dryer Balls a try. They are a small investment that pays off with every load, contributing to a greener and more effective laundry experience. A must-have for anyone looking to upgrade their laundry routine.
En realidad no disminuye el tiempo de secado ni quitan estática. Son buena opción para secar chamarras de plumas pero igual podría ser una pelota de tennis 🎾

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was honestly a bit sceptical about whether these tumble dryer balls would work but, my goodness, they do! It’s really reduced the drying time. Impressive.

reviews.reviewTitle: Speeds up Drying Time, That Saves Me Money on Power!!
reviews.reviewText: At first, I admit to being sceptical about the Wool Dryer Balls, but I decided to try them anyway. So glad I did! These 6 balls definitely speed up the drying process, I have much less lint every load and they leave the load with completely dry, a lot fewer wrinkles and no musty odours. Fast delivery, great price, and truly wonderful product! Anything that saves me money, in the long run, is worth buying! HIGHLY RECOMMEND!

After the few test trials, I am confident to confirm that the dryer balls indeed speed up drying time if you do not overload your dryer (small- medium size clothings). I've put some essential oil on the balls in absent of not using softener, it smell heaven.Here is the bad news for those who are thinking to use for bedding (quilt cover, and sheets), let's be realistic, small balls will be tangled on large items and please put down you expectation.Otherwise, these dryer balls are useful, can keep your towels fluffy and your energy savings happy.
